abstract: Reports that drug giant Pfizer is in talks to acquire rival Wyeth in a deal that could be worth more than $60 billion are having a treacherous effect on shares of Crucell, a Dutch biotech company.
snippet: Reports that drug giant Pfizer is in talks to acquire rival Wyeth in a deal that could be worth more than $60 billion are having a treacherous effect on shares of Crucell, a Dutch biotech company.
lead_paragraph: Reports that drug giant Pfizer is in talks to acquire rival Wyeth in a deal that could be worth more than $60 billion are having a treacherous effect on shares of Crucell, a Dutch biotech company.

headline.main: Do Pfizer-Wyeth Talks Leave Crucell Out in the Cold?
